definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Imv. ms. [[חֲבִי]] Is 26:20 (Aram. form, Ol:§ 235, 3 Ew:§ 224 c Du; Di rds. [[חֲבֵּי]] = [[חֲבֵה]]), withdraw into privacy (‖[[בּאׁ בַחֲדָרֶיךָ]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְנֶחְבָּה]] consec. Je 49:10; [[לְנַחְבֵּתֶם]] consec. Jos 2:16 (JE); Inf. [[לְהֵחָבֵה]] (as [[א]]“[[ל]]) 1Ki 22:25, 2Ki 7:12; withdraw, hide oneself, lit. Jos 216 (JE), sq. [[שָׁמָּה]]; 2Ki 7:12 c. [[בְּ]] loc.; 1Ki 22:25; of Esau = Edom, hiding from judgment of ´[[י]], [[וְנֶחְבָּה לאׁ יוּכָָּל]] Je 49:10, as pointed, meant no doubt as pf., but constr. then hard; rd. rather inf. abs. [[נַחְבּׂה]]; so Gf Gie al. (v. Kö:i. 624).
